alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 3:57PM EST until February 16 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... * Until 430 PM EST. * At 357 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jamestown, or 16 miles northwest of Monticello, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Faubush around 405 PM EST. Nancy around 410 PM EST. Pulaski County Park around 415 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Science Hill, Dabney and Shopville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
